page.title: 20OLD CLEEVE CHURCH & SUMMARY
page.content:
{ST. ANDREWS CHURCH - }In the parish of Old Cleeve it also serves Roadwater Washford and Treborough.This original 11th Century Church holds 198 people but the congregation is usually 25-40 The vicar's name is the{Rev.H.Allen. An old legend tells of a previous verger being cut to pieces.It has a barrel roof and stainedglass windows.
Watchet is a little place At Watchet there 's life There are boats in Watchet harbour Cargoes coming in and out Houses big and small Even lighthouses and farms To bring people for their holidays. {by Clive Norman The information for the Watchet Area was compiled by{St.Decuman's School with help from Watchet,Old Cleeve,and Danesfield Schools.Pupils were{8-9 yrs
